passages.text:
You see 4 agressive-looking man in front of you.

[[Pull out your gun -> ShootingStarts]]

[["Hello!"->Arguing]]
[["Get out of my way if you want to live! (Intimidate)"->IntimidationSuccess]]
[["I guess I'll just need to go away."->GoAway]]
[["Excuse me! How can I get to the library?"->AskHimSomething]]

links.name: "Get out of my way if you want to live! (Intimidate)"
"I guess I'll just need to go away."
"Excuse me! How can I get to the library?"

passages.name: Start

passages.text:
Get the hell out of here! If you want to live, of course.

[[Pull out your gun -> ShootingStarts]]

[["Get out of my way if you want to live! (Intimidate)"->IntimidationSuccess]]
[["I guess I'll just need to go away."->GoAway]]
[["I've got something to offer. There is no need to shout." (Bribe) -> Bribe]]

links.name: "Get out of my way if you want to live! (Intimidate)"
"I guess I'll just need to go away."
"I've got something to offer. There is no need to shout." (Bribe)

passages.name: Arguing

passages.text:
Alright, alrigh! Just calm down! You can pass.

[["You know what? I've changed my mind. I'll just kill you." -> ShootingStarts]]
[[Pass through the cordon->Pass]]

links.name: "You know what? I've changed my mind. I'll just kill you."

passages.name: IntimidationSuccess

passages.text:
Oh... You just don't look like a rich man. It will cost you...
5000 credits.

[[Give him the money -> Pay]]
[[Pull out your gun -> ShootingStarts]]
[["I guess I'll just need to go away."->GoAway]]

links.name: "I guess I'll just need to go away."

passages.name: Bribe
